text: Rasula imana enechena ya tamra prabhura kacha theke tamra kache abatirna hayeche, ara bisbasira'o. Tara saba'i imana eneche allah‌te, ara tamra phiris‌tagane, ara tamra kitabasamuhe, ara tamra rasulagane, -- ''amara tamra rasuladera konojanera madhye kono parthakya kari na.’’ Tara ara'o bale -- ''amara suni ara amara palana kari, he amadera prabhu! Tomara paritrana, ara tomara'i kache gantabyapatha.’’
